description: STRING No. 87 // From 2022-10-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // Paint scattered on a canvas in no particular order. To be seen with the video works with the same name. Read The Dark Forest by Lui Cixin, the Fermi paradox by Brin Brin and Superintelligence by Nick Bostrom.
name: Dark Forest VII/VIII
